mail.forgot-password.body-message-line1: We received a request to change the password for the account linked to your email address.
mail.forgot-password.body-message-line2: If you don't want to reset your password, you can ignore this message.
mail.forgot-password.body-title: Forgot your password? Let's get you a new one.
mail.forgot-password.subject: Reset My Soil Capital password
mail.verify-email.body-message-line1: You have created a new account on mySoilCapital App. To complete your sign up, please click on the link below to verify your email address and activate your account.
mail.verify-email.subject: Verify your email address
